content:
DependencyPropertyValueSource Class

In this Article

Identifies and reports value sources for properties that are dependent upon a parent property.

Syntax

Declaration

public class DependencyPropertyValueSource : System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueSource
  • DependencyPropertyValueSource

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
,
Equals(Object,Object)
,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Properties summary

CustomMarkupExtension

Gets a property element in XAML code that contains a markup extension.
DataBound

Gets the value of a property that represents a binding between a property and a data source.
DefaultValue

Gets the value of a property that does not have its value set in XAML and does not inherit any value from its parent property.
Inherited

Gets the value of a property that is inherited from a parent property.
IsCustomMarkupExtension

Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a custom markup extension.
IsDataBound

Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a data binding expression.
IsDefaultValue

Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to its default value.
IsExpression

Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to an expression.
IsInherited

Gets a value that indicates whether the property is inherited from a parent property.
IsLocal

Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a local value.
IsLocalResource

Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a resource value that appears inside a block of code, in blocks nested in that block, or within the list of formal parameter declarations in a function definition.
IsResource

Read-only property that returns true if the property is set to a system or local resource.
IsSystemResource

Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a system resource.
IsTemplateBinding

Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DependencyPropertyValueSource.TemplateBinding* markup extension.
Local

Gets the value of a property set to a local value.
LocalDynamicResource

Gets the value of a property that represents a LocalDynamicResource reference.
LocalStaticResource

Gets the value of a property that represents a LocalStaticResource reference.
SystemResource

Gets the value of a property set to a SystemResource.
TemplateBinding

Gets the value of a property that represents a TemplateBinding markup extension.

Properties

  • CustomMarkupExtension

    Gets a property element in XAML code that contains a markup extension.

    public static System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DependencyPropertyValueSource CustomMarkupExtension { get; }

    Property Value

    • DependencyPropertyValueSource

      A value source that is a XAML element that contains a markup extension.

  • DataBound

    Gets the value of a property that represents a binding between a property and a data source.

    public static System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DependencyPropertyValueSource DataBound { get; }

    Property Value

    • DependencyPropertyValueSource

      A value source that designates a data binding.

  • DefaultValue

    Gets the value of a property that does not have its value set in XAML and does not inherit any value from its parent property.

    public static System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DependencyPropertyValueSource DefaultValue { get; }

    Property Value

    • DependencyPropertyValueSource

      A default value source.

  • Inherited

    Gets the value of a property that is inherited from a parent property.

    public static System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DependencyPropertyValueSource Inherited { get; }

    Property Value

    • DependencyPropertyValueSource

      A value source that indicates the property is inherited.

  • IsCustomMarkupExtension

    Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a custom markup extension.

    public bool IsCustomMarkupExtension { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is a custom markup extension; otherwise, false.

  • IsDataBound

    Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a data binding expression.

    public bool IsDataBound { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is set to a data binding expression; otherwise, false.

  • IsDefaultValue

    Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to its default value.

    public bool IsDefaultValue { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is set to its default value; otherwise, false.

  • IsExpression

    Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to an expression.

    public bool IsExpression { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is set to an expression; otherwise, false.

  • IsInherited

    Gets a value that indicates whether the property is inherited from a parent property.

    public bool IsInherited { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is inherited; otherwise, false.

  • IsLocal

    Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a local value.

    public bool IsLocal { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is set to a local value; otherwise, false.

  • IsLocalResource

    Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a resource value that appears inside a block of code, in blocks nested in that block, or within the list of formal parameter declarations in a function definition.

    public bool IsLocalResource { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is set to a local resource value; otherwise, false.

  • IsResource

    Read-only property that returns true if the property is set to a system or local resource.

    public bool IsResource { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is set to a system or local resource; otherwise, false.

  • IsSystemResource

    Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a system resource.

    public bool IsSystemResource { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is set to a system resource; otherwise, false.

  • IsTemplateBinding

    Gets a value that indicates whether the property is set to a stem.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DependencyPropertyValueSource.TemplateBinding* markup extension.

    public bool IsTemplateBinding { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the property is set to a template binding markup extension; otherwise, false.

  • Local

    Gets the value of a property set to a local value.

    public static System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DependencyPropertyValueSource Local { get; }

    Property Value

    • DependencyPropertyValueSource

      A value source that contains a local value.

  • LocalDynamicResource

    Gets the value of a property that represents a LocalDynamicResource reference.

    public static System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DependencyPropertyValueSource LocalDynamicResource { get; }

    Property Value

    • DependencyPropertyValueSource

      A value source that contains a dynamic resource reference.

    Remarks

    Dynamic resource provides a value for a XAML property by deferring that value to be a runtime reference to a resource. A dynamic resource reference forces a new lookup each time that such a resource is accessed.

  • LocalStaticResource

    Gets the value of a property that represents a LocalStaticResource reference.

    public static System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DependencyPropertyValueSource LocalStaticResource { get; }

    Property Value

    • DependencyPropertyValueSource

      A value source that contains a static resource reference.

    Remarks

    A static resource provides a value for a XAML property by substituting the value of an already defined resource.

  • SystemResource

    Gets the value of a property set to a SystemResource.

    public static System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DependencyPropertyValueSource SystemResource { get; }

    Property Value

    • DependencyPropertyValueSource

      A value source that contains a value that designates a system resource.

  • TemplateBinding

    Gets the value of a property that represents a TemplateBinding markup extension.

    public static System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.DependencyPropertyValueSource TemplateBinding { get; }

    Property Value

    • DependencyPropertyValueSource

      A value source that represents a template binding markup extension.
